work.title: EPOCH
work.content: EPOCH needed a logo and brand to launch their new blockchain initiative. We helped them build that out along with a Wordpress site.

work.title: Veratrak
work.content: Veratrak, a pharmaceutical blockchain company that specialise in storing, protecting, and collaborating on critical documentation in the pharmaceutical supply chain needed a logo and a website to launch their product.

work.title: Boombocs
work.content: Boombocs' website needed modern flourishes and a new landing page added to their existing Shopify site. We redesigned and implemented a dynamic homepage and some secondary pages.

work.title: North Star Law
work.content: We refreshed their dated website into a sleek, professional looking site while drawing out new branding opportunities. We built the website on Wordpress to allow them to update and edit the content.

work.title: Emdad Rashid (3DUX.co.uk)
work.content: For Emdad Rashid, we created a bespoke Wordpress theme. This theme needed a login area where clients could request to see their more sensitive work. Designed by Emdad Rashid, we focused on the development.
